DisplayName: Solo play Fade out start time at death [seconds]
Description: How many seconds have passed after "YOU DIED" is displayed at the time of death of solo play to start fading out?
Black Ghost Fade Out Start Time [Seconds]
Minimum: How many seconds have passed after "YOU DIED" is displayed when a white or black ghost dies to start fading out?

Description: It is used to calculate what percentage of the gauge length provided by the resource is used when displaying the HP gauge.
It is used to calculate what percentage of the gauge length provided by the resource is used when displaying the MP gauge.
It is used to calculate what percentage of the gauge length provided by the resource is used when displaying the SP gauge.

DisplayName: Action panel switching judgment_player speed [m / sec]
Description: Action panel Switchable player speed. Switchable if below this speed

DisplayName: Action panel switching judgment_player speed judgment time [sec]
Description: Action panel Consideration time to increase the speed of switchable players. Use the average speed of this time (systematically up to 4 seconds)

DisplayName: Vertical position of the key guide icon
Description: Vertical position of key guide icon (+: top
Minimum: -: bottom)

Description: If the cursor position is within this radius
Minimum: it means that it is selected.

Description: (dummy8)
Decal display position offset left and right
Decal display position offset vertical direction
The number of seconds it takes for the FE Search icon to start fading in and then fading out.
The number of seconds it takes for the FE Battle icon to start fading in and then fading out.
Movement speed when moving smoothly

DisplayName: First movement distance of the cursor [px]
Description: Distance to move only once at the first input

DisplayName: Delay time for the first movement of the cursor [sec]
Description: The time it takes to move only once at the first input
Waiting time from input to smooth movement
Move the cursor closer than this radius to start adsorption (for snap mode)
The time it takes to start and complete adsorption

DisplayName: Item acquisition log: Display time of 1 line [sec]
Description: Time to add one line of log and fade out. There is a timer for each line

DisplayName: Upper limit of player maximum SA (trunk value)
Description: It is used to calculate what percentage of the gauge length provided by the resource is used when displaying the SA gauge.

DisplayName: Underground map switchable event flag ID
Description: Specify the event flag ID that manages whether it is possible to switch to the underground map. When this event flag ID is ON
Minimum: it is possible to switch to the underground map.

DisplayName: Additional ban distance for traversal range [m]
Description: Distance (m) that extends in four directions around the player. I decided to break through this range

DisplayName: Wait time before and after scrolling [sec]
Description: The number of seconds to wait before and after scrolling through the long text of the operation announcement. For example
Minimum: if it is 3 seconds
Maximum: wait for a total of 6 seconds before and after.

Description: Scrolling speed (pixels / second) when scrolling long sentences in the operation announcement. It does not depend on the screen size. Think of the entire menu as 1920x1080
The number of seconds to display when it is a short sentence that does not require scrolling of the operation announcement
Number of times to repeat when scrolling long sentences of management announcement
(dummy8)
Display distance [m] of the memo marker displayed on the compass. Anything closer than this distance will be displayed
The display distance of the bonfire displayed on the compass [m]. Anything closer than this distance will be displayed

DisplayName: Goal judgment distance of destination marker [m]
Description: Goal judgment distance [m] of the destination marker. The destination marker disappears when you get closer than this distance

DisplayName: Saturation / brightness slider movement amount [% / sec]
Description: Amount of movement of the saturation / brightness slider of the color control [% / sec]. Maximum amount to move in 1 second when each value is 0% to 100%. Since it is operated with an analog stick
Minimum: it becomes a ratio by the input value.

Description: Wait time before playing the OP movie. > SEQ 15261
The scale value of the key guide icon. 100% is the texture size as it is

DisplayName: Scale of key guide icon for pad operation list [%]
Description: Scale value of the key guide icon for the pad operation list. 100% is the texture size as it is

DisplayName: Vertical position of the key guide icon for the pad operation list
Description: Vertical position of the key guide icon for the pad operation list (+: top
Minimum: -: bottom)

DisplayName: Key guide icon scale for key config [%]
Description: The scale value of the key guide icon for the key config. 100% is the texture size as it is

DisplayName: Vertical position of the key guide icon for key config
Description: Vertical position of key guide icon for key config (+: top
Minimum: -: bottom)

Description: Range [m] (radius) that makes unsearched masks searched. It is assumed that the circle centered on the player has been searched.
Tutorial (toast notification) display time [sec]. It will be closed automatically after this time has passed

DisplayName: Display distance_Cooperation / Relief Guest side: Host
Description: Display distance [m] of other players (friendly hosts) to be displayed on the compass. If you are more than this distance
Minimum: it will be displayed on the compass.

Description: Display distance [m] of other players (enemy hosts) displayed on the compass. If you are more than this distance
Minimum: it will be displayed on the compass.

DisplayName: Display distance_host / cooperation / rescue Host side: cooperation / rescue guest
Description: Display distance [m] of other players (friendly guests) to be displayed on the compass. If you are more than this distance
Minimum: it will be displayed on the compass.

Description: The amount of time that the key guide will continue to be displayed after the cutscene skip has been pre-entered. Since skip input is accepted only while the key guide is displayed
Minimum: it can be said that it is the skip input acceptance time.

Description: [HUD: Auto setting] HP ratio. If the HP ratio is below this value
Minimum: the HP gauge will always be displayed. Percentage and current value are OR conditions (displayed if either is satisfied)

DisplayName: HP gauge: Current value always displayed
Description: [HUD: Auto setting] HP current value. If the current HP value is less than or equal to this value
Minimum: the HP gauge will always be displayed. Percentage and current value are OR conditions (displayed if either is satisfied)

DisplayName: MP gauge: Percentage to always display [%]
Description: [HUD: Auto setting] MP ratio. If the MP ratio is below this value
Minimum: the MP gauge is always displayed. Percentage and current value are OR conditions (displayed if either is satisfied)

DisplayName: MP gauge: Current value always displayed
Description: [HUD: Auto setting] MP current value. If the current MP value is less than or equal to this value
Minimum: the MP gauge is always displayed. Percentage and current value are OR conditions (displayed if either is satisfied)

DisplayName: SP gauge: Percentage to always display [%]
Description: [HUD: Auto setting] SP ratio. If the SP ratio is less than or equal to this value
Minimum: the SP gauge is always displayed. Percentage and current value are OR conditions (displayed if either is satisfied)

DisplayName: SP gauge: Current value always displayed
Description: [HUD: Auto setting] SP current value. If the current SP value is less than or equal to this value
Minimum: the SP gauge is always displayed. Percentage and current value are OR conditions (displayed if either is satisfied)

Description: World map: Time to zoom animation [seconds]
World map: Display magnification of the map point icon at zoom step 0 (0.0 to 1.0). 1x (1.0) at zoom step 2. From there
Minimum: the icon magnification is also interpolated according to the enlargement ratio.

DisplayName: Map point unit Additional ban distance when the ban is lifted [m]
Description: World map: Additional ban distance [m] when the ban is lifted in map point units. When the ban on map points such as the distant view stand is lifted
Minimum: the ban on the traversal range will be lifted. Distance to be additionally extended in 4 directions around the map point

Description: How far can the center coordinates of the enemy HP gauge go to the left end? Since it is the center coordinate

Description: How far can the center coordinates of the enemy HP gauge go to the right end? Since it is the center coordinate
Minimum: the size of the gauge body is included.

Minimum: the size of the gauge body is included.

Description: How far can the center coordinates of the enemy HP gauge go to the lower end? Since it is the center coordinate
